title: I tried to build a chatbot and this happened ðŸ˜± | Erick Ramirez #vectorsearch
description:
I wanted to see what it's like to use ChatGPT to query my database so I built a chatbot and you won't believe what happened!
I used OpenAI's APIs to create embeddings of my data and stored them in Astra. Then ran a vector search and fed it into a ChatGPT prompt to get an answer.
With just a few lines of code, I've built an AI chatbot with ChatGPT and Astra, powered by Cassandra vector database!
If you'd like to know more, check out Ania KubÃ³w's video on vector embeddings -- https://dtsx.io/3Pj5dTq.

transcript.text: I wanted to see what it was like to clear my database using chat GPT so I built a chatbot and you won't believe what happened let me show you I use the squad data set from hiking paste for this experiment then I denormalize the data into titles context questions and answers like this open ai's text embedding model I created embeddings for the context and titles then store the embedding so the rest of the data in the squad table I want to find out when the College of Engineering was established at Notre Dame so I created an embedding for the question using the same open AI API call us before this query Returns the top three nearest neighbors I submitted these results in the chat GPT prompt and finally got the answer so that's it with just a few lines of code I've built a chatbot with chat GPT and Astra if you'd like to know more check out Annie's video on vector embeddings
